Name: Ghost Bear Watch
Description: The Ghost Bear Watch is the intelligence and internal security arm of the Ghost Bear Dominion. Formed from a blend of traditional Clan Watch doctrine and Inner Sphere counterintelligence practices, it is tasked with uncovering espionage, hunting traitors, and monitoring external threats to the Dominion’s stability. Operatives of the Watch are known for their ruthless efficiency, deep infiltration tactics, and unwavering loyalty to the Clan. Though shrouded in secrecy, the Watch plays a critical role in maintaining the Ghost Bear’s control over their vast territory. Especially in identifying rogue elements and dealing with them.
ReputationStatements: You are a stain the Watch would see erased; still, the task must be done, and none better are available.
Your presence offends our code, but necessity outweighs disgust. For now.
Doubt clouds every move you make; this contract is not trust, it is surveillance.
You are neither asset nor threat; this operation will decide what you become.
You have performed with competence, if not yet clarity of purpose; we offer you another test. Do not waste it.
You act with consistency, and that earns attention. This assignment is yours, but with the Watch’s eye upon you.
Among outsiders, few earn the Watch’s regard; you have, and this contract reflects that standing.
You are counted as kin-in-purpose now. Take this mission as one of ours and do not fail us.
MissionSuccessStatements: You fulfilled your objective. The Watch acknowledges competence. Nothing more, nothing less.
GoodFaithFailureStatements: The objective was lost, but your actions remained within acceptable parameters. That will be noted.
BadFaithFailureStatements: You failed the mission, and the cost will echo beyond this world. The Watch will remember.
